page.title: 07Amenities
page.content: There are significant open spaces in our area, the village of Preston has a large recreation field which was opened in the mid 1970's. The village has a playground and sports pavilion on the recreation field. Within the grounds of the local secondary school there is a large sports hall which is jointly run by the Humberside Local Education Authority and the Holderness District Council. A sports hall and swimming pool provide a very good athletics facility. Clubs that are organised are the YFC, the WI, Scouts and Guides, as well as a large council organised Youth Club at the local secondary school.
